page.title: How to Use getspace
page.subtitle: Learn how to make the most of our platform with these easy-to-follow video tutorials

clientTutorial.title: For Clients: Finding & Booking Spaces
clientTutorial.description: Learn how to search for the perfect space, filter by your requirements, view availability, and complete your booking in just a few clicks.

hostTutorial.title: For Hosts: Listing Your Space
hostTutorial.description: Discover how to create compelling listings, manage your calendar, set pricing, handle bookings, and maximize your space's potential on our platform.

search.title: Smart Search
search.description: Use filters to find exactly what you need by location, size, amenities, and availability.

booking.title: Easy Booking
booking.description: Book spaces instantly with real-time availability and instant confirmation.

payment.title: Secure Payment
payment.description: Pay safely with multiple payment options and automatic receipts.
